ng a firm grip on her wrist.)



Birdbot: Now, just listen to me...You and =
the guy that I used to like, eh?...Well, do me a favor, eh?...And I won't t=
ouch the child at the time being...And you come with me...I'll leave withou=
t touching the child or that bastard right there...

Aerotaur with his blade.)



Birdbot: And you come with me.......Eh?...Come=
 now, I won't kill you unless you make a lame attempt to leave me...You mus=
t come with me, so that bastard can suffer and feel the pain, of his girl b=
eing took away...And he can worry and suffer...Make him feel the pain he ma=
de me feel...You see, you took the thing I loved, now I want to take the th=
ing he loves...Understand?......



(Birdbot's smile grows wider as he awai=
ts an answer from Nightlight...)
